name: NPS App
description: A very simple NPS score collector

config.markdown:
## MANUAL STEP NOTICE: This app needs to injects code into your website through posthog-js. You need to **opt-in** on your site to enable this behaviour.

```
posthog.init("api_key", {
  "api_host": "https://app.posthog.com",
  "opt_in_site_apps": true,
})
```

config.name: prompt
config.hint: Customize this to add your product name
config.default: On a scale of 0-10, how likely are you to recommend this product?
